skill.name: Crippling Wave
skill.description:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Unleash a series of large sweeping attacks that deal 155% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies in front of you.

Every third hit also dazes enemies within 11 yards, slowing their movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Sweeping punches that cripple enemies, reducing their attack and movement speed.

rune.name: Mangle
rune.description: Increase damage to 255% weapon damage as Fire.
rune.simpleDescription:
Increase damage of Crippling Wave.

Crippling Wave's damage turns into Fire.

skill.name: Cyclone Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Pull up to 16 enemies within 24 yards towards you, followed by a furious blast of energy that deals 261% weapon damage as Holy.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Mystical force pulls nearby enemies towards you and blasts them.

rune.name: Implosion
rune.description: Increase the distance enemies will be pulled towards you to 34 yards.
rune.simpleDescription: Increase the distance enemies will be pulled towards you.

skill.name: Epiphany
skill.description:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second by 20 and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.

rune.name: Inner Fire
rune.description: Engulf yourself in flames, causing your attacks to assault enemies for 353% weapon damage as Fire.
rune.simpleDescription: Engulf yourself in flames, causing your attacks to assault enemies with Fire.

skill.name: Exploding Palm
skill.description:
Cost: 40 Spirit

Cause an enemy to Bleed for 1200% weapon damage as Physical over 9 seconds. If the enemy dies while bleeding, it explodes and deals 2770% weapon damage as Physical damage to all nearby enemies.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 40 Spirit

Strike and Bleed an enemy. The enemy will explode if killed while bleeding.

rune.name: The Flesh is Weak
rune.description: Enemies hit take 15% additional damage for 9 seconds.
rune.simpleDescription: Enemies hit take additional damage from attacks.

skill.name: Mantra of Conviction
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: Damage bonus is increased to 16% for 3 seconds.

Passive: Enemies within 30 yards of you take 8% increased damage.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: Damage bonus is increased for a short duration.

Passive: Nearby enemies take increased damage.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.

rune.name: Annihilation
rune.description: Passive: Killing an enemy that is affected by Mantra of Conviction grants you and your allies 30% increased movement speed for 3 seconds.
rune.simpleDescription: Passive: Killing an enemy that is affected by Mantra of Conviction grants you and your allies increased movement speed for a short duration.

skill.name: Dashing Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash up to 50 yards, striking enemies along the way for 370% weapon damage as Physical.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash and strike enemies.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.

rune.name: Way of the Falling Star
rune.description:
Gain 20% increased movement speed for 4 seconds after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Holy.
rune.simpleDescription:
Gain increased movement speed after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Holy.

skill.name: Momentum
skill.description: Moving 25 yards increases your damage by 20% for 6 seconds.
skill.flavor: Always in motion, flowing like water.

skill.name: Alacrity
skill.description: Increase the attack speed of Spirit Generators by 15%.
skill.flavor: "The harmony of mind, body, and spirit brings many blessings. A monk who has become as one will move like a storm crashing into the mountains. Fast, hard, and without hesitation." — Patriarch Anisim

skill.name: Seize the Initiative
skill.description: Dealing damage to enemies above 75% Life increases your attack speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
skill.flavor: The Monks of Ivgorod are trained to move like water — flowing freely into open spaces and crashing hard against their foes.

skill.name: Fleet Footed
skill.flavor: Strength out of place is no strength at all.

skill.name: Heal
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar for 193112 Life.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar.

skill.name: Intimidate
skill.description: Enemies that hit or are hit by the Templar are slowed by 80% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription: Enemies that hit or are hit by the Templar are slowed.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges a target, dealing 280% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning nearby enemies.

skill.name: Inspire
skill.description:
Increases your resource generation.

Mana: 7 per second.
Hatred: 1 per second.
Wrath: 1.1 per second.
Arcane Power: 1.4 per second.
Fury: 10% generated.
Spirit: 10% generated.

skill.name: Crippling Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 4 seconds

Ranged attack that deals 140% weapon damage and slows enemies hit by 80% for 4 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 4 seconds

Ranged attack that slows enemies.

skill.name: Dirty Fighting
skill.description:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel.

skill.name: Powered Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Ranged attack that explodes on impact, dealing 310% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies within 10 yards and has a 100% chance to Stun enemies for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Deals damage in an area that has a chance to Stun enemies.

skill.name: Hysteria
skill.description: Whenever you or the Scoundrel land a Critical Hit, you both will go into hysterics, increasing all damage done by 3% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription: Critical Hits cause you and the Scoundrel to temporarily deal more damage.
